config.hotkey.tooltip: Key to instantly finish and advance dialogue when a Dialogue Box is open.
config.confirm.tooltip: When enabled, press the hotkey twice within the window to advance after the line is fully revealed.
config.doubleTap.tooltip: How long you have to press the hotkey a second time to advance when confirmation is required.
config.cooldown.tooltip: Ignores repeated presses faster than this to prevent spam when holding the key.
config.confirmMessage.tooltip: Show a HUD hint when the next press will advance the dialogue.
